title: Bank proof-of-funds letters
dataVerified: Account holder name, issuing bank, letter date, expiration date, reference number, account balance range (if disclosed in letter)
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Revocation date (if revoked). Link to bank verification system (bank officers only with account holder consent, requires login)
rationale: Real estate/private placements; prevents forged PoF letters. Critical for high-value transactions. Account holders don't need to share physical letters reducing exposure of sensitive financial information while maintaining trust.
